question: 産む
sourceMnemonic:
This word consists of kanji with hiragana attached. Because the hiragana ends with an <ja>う</ja> sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>give birth</kanji> so the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to give birth</vocabulary>.

You know another <ja>産む</ja> as well (<ja>生む</ja>). This <ja>産む</ja> is more sciency, but both are good to know.
sourceReadingMnemonic: You know another "to give birth" word (<ja>生む</ja>). Guess what!? They share readings!
